person.persName: John J. Gritton (Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer & murder victim)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth McKinney Gritton in Mercer County, Kentucky, in December 1843. Father of Elizabeth Gritton, William Gritton, and Charles Gritton. Married to Mary Ann Reed Gritton in Mercer County, Kentucky, in December 1854. Father of Louisa Gritton and Matty A. Gritton. Farmer in Mercer County in 1850. Farmer in Mercer County in 1863. Murdered in Mercer County, Kentucky, allegedly by George D. McKeney, on January 19, 1864.
